Color palette names

Source: R/color_palettes.R
pal_names.Rd

Known color palettes info provided as named list of character vectors. List names correspond to the name of the palette package. The character vectors list the palettes that are available within. These palettes can be passed to the default color setting functions

Usage

pal_names

Format

An object of class list of length 11.

Value

palette colors

Examples

pal_names
#> $hcl
#>   [1] "Pastel 1"      "Dark 2"        "Dark 3"        "Set 2"        
#>   [5] "Set 3"         "Warm"          "Cold"          "Harmonic"     
#>   [9] "Dynamic"       "Grays"         "Light Grays"   "Blues 2"

#>  [21] "Purple-Blue"   "Red-Purple"    "Red-Blue"      "Purple-Orange"
#>  [25] "Purple-Yellow" "Blue-Yellow"   "Green-Yellow"  "Red-Yellow"
